channel.title: FAQ on Hugo Dionysus Theme Example
channel.description: Recent content in FAQ on Hugo Dionysus Theme Example

item.title: dionysus-example
item.description: Goals available for this plugin: 2 goals Goal Description dionysus-example:help Display help information on dionysus-example-maven-plugin. Call mvn dionysus-example:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details. dionysus-example:helper Helper mojo. Usage You should specify the version in your project’s plugin configuration: <project> <build> <!-- plugin management --> <pluginMangement> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.sonatype.dionysus</groupId> <artifactId>dionysus-example-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>1-SNAPSHOT</version> </plugin> </plugins> </pluginMangement> <!-- plugin execution --> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.

item.title: dionysus-example:help
item.description: dionysus-example:help Display help information on dionysus-example-maven-plugin. Call mvn dionysus-example:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details. Full name org.sonatype.dionysus:dionysus-example-maven-plugin:1-SNAPSHOT:help Requires Project false Requires Online false Requires Direct Invocation false Thread-safe true Parameters 4 parameters Name Type Since Description detail boolean If true, display all settable properties for each goal. goal java.lang.String The name of the goal for which to show help.

item.title: dionysus-example:helper
item.description: dionysus-example:helper Helper mojo. Full name org.sonatype.dionysus:dionysus-example-maven-plugin:1-SNAPSHOT:helper Since ??? Phase generate-resources Requires Project true Requires Online false Requires Direct Invocation false Thread-safe false Parameters 2 parameters Name Type Since Description anotherThingy java.lang.String ??? Another thingy. skip boolean ??? Skip execution. anotherThingy Another thingy. Type java.lang.String Since ??? Required true Default Value foo skip Skip execution.

item.title: Who is Dionysus
item.description: Dionysus (/daɪ.əˈnaɪsəs/; Greek: Διόνυσος Dionysos) is the god of the grape harvest, winemaking and wine, of ritual madness, fertility, theatre and religious ecstasy in ancient Greek religion and myth.

item.title: Who is Xenu
item.description: Xenu (/ˈziːnuː/), also called Xemu, was, according to Scientology founder L. Ron Hubbard, the dictator of the “Galactic Confederacy” who 75 million years ago brought billions of his people to Earth (then known as “Teegeeack”) in DC-8-like spacecraft, stacked them around volcanoes, and killed them with hydrogen bombs. Official Scientology scriptures hold that the thetans (immortal spirits) of these aliens adhere to humans, causing spiritual harm.
